headline: Avery Dennison (AVY): Checking the Valuation After a Recent Share Price Recovery
summary: Avery Dennison (AVY) has been quietly grinding higher over the past month, even as its one year return still lags. That mix of recent momentum and longer term underperformance sets up an interesting value check. See our latest analysis for Avery Dennison. At around $174.96 per share, Avery Dennison has seen its 90 day share price return edge higher even as its one year total shareholder return remains negative, suggesting sentiment is improving but the longer term story is still...
